content: this digital pdf pattern for a umbreon amigurumi crochet doll stands at approximately 3 15 inches or ~8cm tall when finished excluding the ears so from the base to the top of the head i have one of all of the eeveelutions this is an ad-free digital download of a pattern that can be found for free on my website at www 53stitches com for this pattern you will need - 3 00mm crochet hook - polyester filling - 2x 10 00mm red safety eyes - black yarn - yellow yarn - yellow felt optional - fabric glue optional - yarn needle - scissors the pattern is written in us terms and worked in continuous rounds -------------------- this pattern is in english only the pattern cannot be copied or resold nor any of my photographs used you may sell any items made with it provided all photography is your own
